name: Add new Blog post
command: curl -X POST -H "Content-Type:application/json" --data "{"""creationDate""":"""1555769405047""","""author""":"""Poster""","""title""":"""This is my first blog post""","""content""":"""Content"""}" http://localhost:8080/addBlogItem

name: Get a Blog post by its ID
Add comment to blog post
command: curl -X POST -H "Content-Type:application/json" --data "{"""blogId""":"""(blog ID here)""","""commentDate""":"""1555769405047""","""author""":"""Commenter""","""content""":"""This is a comment""","""likes""":"""0"""}" http://localhost:8080/addComment

name: Get comments on a blog post by its ID
Add tags to blog post
command: curl -X POST -H "Content-Type:application/json" --data "[{"""tagName""":"""funny""", """blogId""":"""(blog ID here)"""},{"""tagName""":"""joke""", """blogId""":"""(blog ID here)"""}]" http://localhost:8080/addTags
